name: Mr. X: Makeshift Hell
description:
Run, dash, slide, crawl? In this fast paced action game where you have only moments to react to what lies ahead, you play as mad scientist Mr. X. A madman who descended into madness, trapped by the reality of not being perfect.

Originally created back in 2015, Makeshift Hell was designed with the intent to be an impossible game to beat. You start with only a single life and must make it to end. If you die, its gameover and you'll be reset back to level 1.

Controls: LMB to Jump (Left Mouse Button)

Music by: Kevin MacLeod

https://incompetech.com/wordpress/2016/02/cyborg-ninja/

If you enjoyed this game, be sure to follow and play my other game Three Random Archives!  A game in which you play a collection of three short minigames all within the confinement of a singular game experience.

#action #adventure #platformer #retro #survival #2D
